title: Animated FPS M79 Grenade Launcher with VFX and SFX
description: This pack contains standard and sawed-off versions of the iconic M79 grenade launcher used by American forces during the Vietnam War and still in service today, with VFX and SFX included.
longDescription:
Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=fBO_taV3uRw&feature=youtu.be


Join the Discord server for discounts, support, and discussion: https://discord.gg/CvV2MHk


This pack includes high-detail, PBR, standard and sawed-off versions of the iconic M79 grenade launcher used by American forces during the Vietnam War and still in service today. It also includes one M381 grenade for ammunition. Weapons and FPS arms are animated. Visual effects and sound effects are included. This item is perfect for adding some explosives to the arsenal of any FPS or TPS.


Check out our seller page for other great products. https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/profile/Black%20Fang%20Technologies

Be sure to comment any suggestions, concerns, or praises down bellow. If you buy, be sure to leave a rating.

Reach out to us at xbl.black.fang@gmail.com for support.

Follow us on Twitter @BlackFangTech for updates and special offers.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • M79 Grenade Launcher skeletal mesh
  • Sawed-off M79 skeletal mesh
  • M79 rear sight skeletal mesh
  • M381 whole grenade, projectile, and casing static meshes
  • Working example character and weapon Blueprints
  • Weapon animations, sight animations, FPS arms animations
  • Functioning multi-range projectile sighting system

Texture Sizes: 4096, 2048, 512, 256

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Collision: Yes, mixed types

Vertex Count: 4050, 3334, 1902, 338, 296, 281

LODs: No

Number of Meshes: 6

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 9

Number of Textures: 14

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation: ReadMe.txt file included
